actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to extend and improve the emergency food assistance program.
short_title: Emergency Food Assistance Program Enhancement Act of 2001

summary.text: Emergency Food Assistance Program Enhancement Act of 2001 - Amends the Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to extend the emergency food assistance program (program).Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to: (1) extend authority and increase funding for commodity purchases for program use; and (2) authorize and obligate fund use for related State processing, storing, transporting, and distributing costs.

titles.title: Emergency Food Assistance Program Enhancement Act of 2001
A bill to extend and improve the emergency food assistance program.
